unnormalised: Flipkart's Big Billion Days sale concluded on 10/29/2024, reporting a 35% surge in sales compared to last yr. According to early estimates, the platform saw transactions worth ₹40,000 crore during the 7-day event. Initial data suggests that mobiles contributed 40% to the total sales, with Samsung and Xiaomi leading the charts. Fashion and lifestyle products accounted for 25%, while home appliances and electronics made up the remaining 35%.
